title: Organisational Unit
description: A unit within an organisational hierarchy which may be at, above or below the institutional level.

organisationalUnitName.description: An official name of the organisational unit in the local language.

organisationalUnitType.description: The type or level of organisational unit within a hierarchy responsible for the management of the collection being described.

organisationalUnitDescription.description: Description of the Organisational Unit, suitable for a general audience.

hasOrganisationalUnit.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the OrganisationalUnit class.

organisationalUnitAlternativeName.description: One or more alternative names for the unit in English, if commonly used, and the official name is not in English.

items.description: Alternative name for the unit in English, if commonly used, and the official name is not in English.

hasAddress.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Address class.

hasContactDetail.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the ContactDetail class.

hasPersonRole.description: One or more Person Roles relating to the Organisational Unit

hasReference.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Reference class.

hasIdentifier.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Identifier class.

hasMeasurementOrFact.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the MeasurementOrFact class.
